body: @karurosu_charly 1 year late but it means "Gahama-san limitada"
Too little foreplay, but wonderful dialogues full of affection. What a fantasy world where women take the lead and reassure men.
I'm going to translate this to Spanish. So could anyone tell me what does 'Gahama-san gentei' mean? Maybe... 'Gahama's limit'? Please guys.
